summary: I HAVE AN INFINITI I35 THAT HAS A VIBRATION PROBLEM. INFINITI HAS ATTEMPTED TO FIX THIS 5 TIMES OVER THE LAST YEAR. I HAD THE SAME PROBLEM IN AN I30 THAT I RECEIVED AS A LOANER CAR FROM MY DELAERSHIP. I'VE ALSO BEEN TOLD BY A FRIEND THAT HE HEARD OF A PERSON WITH THE SAME PROBLEM. DURING A CONVERSATION WITH INFINITI CONSUMER AFFAIRS I WAS TOLD THAT THIS WAS A KNOWN ISSUE AND THAT IT IS DEALT WITH ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS. THE SERVICE MANAGER AT THE DEALERSHIP STATED THAT HE KNEW THIS WAS A PROBLEM ALSO.
